ygData.subject: RE: Underwater areas
ygData.msgSnippet: Unfortunately, that s only the bottom of a sort of pit trap back there. Nothing to find.  Was one of the first things I did when I got my song. Quite
ygData.messageBody:
Unfortunately, that's only the bottom of a sort of pit trap back there.
Nothing to find. Was one of the first things I did when I got my song.
Quite disappointing.


At 10:36 AM 7/19/99 -0500, you wrote:
>From: Jennifer Donaldson <cotto004@...>
>
>How about that little area in Surefall Glade where you have to swim
underneath
>some sort of ledge to get to it? I don't have my water breathing song yet,
>and I have been wondering what's back there.
>
>Lanye
>
>>===== Original Message From eqbards@onelist.com =====
>>From: "Elijah Meeker" <elijah@...>
>>
>>The water breathing song and it's possible uses was one of the big factors
>>in playiing a bard for me. Now that I have it I have done some exploring
>>(Everfrost river for one) but now I am looking for suggestions for new
>>areas. Actually I would like to request folks offer little detail besides
>>the zone (unless something is a deathtrap for a level 17, THAT would be
>>appreciated) as exploring is 90 percent of the fun. Er, if it's OOT a
>>general loc would be appreciated too, while I would LOVE to search the whole
>>OOT I just don't have that kinda time *laughs*.
>>
>>Any favorites folks have?
>>
>>Tszaaz D'Kith, Scarlet Moon
>>
>>
